product_name: Camaro Aqua Skin Wave Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Dress for success while paddling, kayaking, surfing or sailing. The Camaro Aqua Skin Wave shorts use lightweight, stretchy neoprene to keep you covered and comfortable in and out of the water. Quick-drying neoprene offers comfortable coverage and light insulation for warmth in and out of the water. Drawstring closure ensures a personalized fit. Closeout.
short_description: Dress for success while paddling, kayaking, surfing or sailing. The Camaro Aqua Skin Wave shorts use lightweight, stretchy neoprene to keep you covered and comfortable in and out of the water.
